title: 6.CYB.1
text: The student will evaluate the risks and benefits associated with sharing personal and public resources or artifacts.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify and explain the difference between personal and public information.
Discuss the consequences of sharing personal and confidential information online.
Evaluate risks and benefits associated with sharing information online.

title: 6.CYB.2
text: The student will investigate various usage agreements designed to protect individuals.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Identify laws governing privacy with computing devices and emerging technologies.
Investigate and describe common components of usage agreements.
Identify user and company protections in a usage agreement.
